title: Fire resistance/ko
data:
**[화염](/wiki/Fire "Fire") 저항**은 대부분의 화염 피해와 뜨거운 물체로부터의 보호를 제공한다. 하지만 [물약](/wiki/Potion "Potion")이 끓는 것이나 [두루마리](/wiki/Scroll "Scroll"), [마법서](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook")가 타는 것을 막을 수는 없으며, [방화](/wiki/Fireproof "Fireproof") 처리가 되지 않은 갑옷이 [불타는](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion") 것도 막을 수 없다. [게헨놈](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom") 입장 전까지는 필수적으로 갖춰야 할 저항인데, 넘쳐나는 [화염 함정](/wiki/Fire_trap "Fire trap")들로부터의 최대 체력 감소를 막기 위해서이다.

The most popular way to become fire resistant is to [eat](/wiki/Eat "Eat") [corpses](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse"). Especially [foodless](/wiki/Foodless "Foodless") players will be interested in [other ways](/wiki/Foodless#Gaining_Intrinsics "Foodless"), or at least in avoiding [traps](/wiki/Trap "Trap").

[Monks](/wiki/Monk "Monk") get intrinsic fire resistance at XL 11, and [priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest") at XL 20.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) [Crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") also brings fire resistance with it.

Extrinsic fire resistance is granted by

- Wearing a [ring of fire resistance](/wiki/Ring_of_fire_resistance "Ring of fire resistance"),
- Wearing [red dragon scale mail](/wiki/Red_dragon_scale_mail "Red dragon scale mail") or scales,
- Wielding [Fire Brand](/wiki/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand"),
- Carrying [the Mitre of Holiness](/wiki/The_Mitre_of_Holiness "The Mitre of Holiness"), the [priest](/wiki/Priest "Priest") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact").

Monsters that are resistant to fire but not to [cold](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") are considered *vulnerable to cold* and take double damage from frosty [explosions](/wiki/Explosion "Explosion")[\[2\]](#cite_note-2) and about 57% more damage from [rays](/wiki/Ray "Ray") of cold.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3) This never applies to your character, even while polymorphed.

## Sources

Intrinsic fire resistance can be obtained from eating the following corpses and globs:

| Monster                                                             | Conduct    | Difficulty | Chance | Notes                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- | ---------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------ |
| [빨강 곰팡이](/wiki/Red_mold "Red mold")                                 | vegan      | 2          | 3%     |                                            |
| [회색 푸딩](/wiki/Gray_ooze "Gray ooze")                                | vegetarian | 4          | 7%     | acidic                                     |
| [젤라티너스 큐브](/wiki/Gelatinous_cube "Gelatinous cube")                 | vegan      | 6          | 10%    | acidic                                     |
| [red naga hatchling](/wiki/Red_naga_hatchling "Red naga hatchling") | meaty      | 4          | 10%    |                                            |
| [살점 골렘](/wiki/Flesh_golem "Flesh golem")                            | meaty      | 10         | 12%    |                                            |
| [크로마틱 드래곤](/wiki/Chromatic_Dragon "Chromatic Dragon")               | meaty      | 23         | 17%    | poisonous, Caveman quest nemesis           |
| [불개미](/wiki/Fire_ant "Fire ant")                                    | meaty      | 6          | 20%    | abundant on the Valkyrie quest             |
| [파이로리스크](/wiki/Pyrolisk "Pyrolisk")                                 | meaty      | 8          | 20%    |                                            |
| [빨강 나가](/wiki/Red_naga "Red naga")                                  | meaty      | 8          | 20%    |                                            |
| [옌도르의 마법사](/wiki/Wizard_of_Yendor "Wizard of Yendor")               | meaty      | 34         | 25%    | 인간에게 [식인](/wiki/Cannibalism "Cannibalism") |
| [화염 거인](/wiki/Fire_giant "Fire giant")                              | meaty      | 11         | 30%    | abundant on the Valkyrie quest             |
| [hell hound pup](/wiki/Hell_hound_pup "Hell hound pup")             | meaty      | 9          | 47%    |                                            |
| [Lord Surtur](/wiki/Lord_Surtur "Lord Surtur")                      | meaty      | 19         | 50%    | Valkyrie quest nemesis                     |
| [salamander](/wiki/Salamander "Salamander")                         | meaty      | 12         | 53%    | poisonous                                  |
| [hell hound](/wiki/Hell_hound "Hell hound")                         | meaty      | 14         | 80%    |                                            |
| [빨강 용](/wiki/Red_dragon "Red dragon")                               | meaty      | 20         | 100%   |                                            |
| [Ixoth](/wiki/Ixoth "Ixoth")                                        | meaty      | 22         | 100%   | Knight quest nemesis                       |

## Messages

The following messages are associated with fire resistance:

- "You feel a momentary chill."

  You gained intrinsic fire resistance by eating a corpse or tin.

- "You be chillin'."

  You gained intrinsic fire resistance by eating a corpse or tin, while hallucinating.

- "You feel cool!"

  You gained intrinsic fire resistance by gaining a level.

- "You feel warmer!"

  You lost intrinsic fire resistance (level drain, [gremlin](/wiki/Gremlin "Gremlin") attack).

- "You feel mildly warm."

  You were burnt, but suffered no damage due to fire resistance.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [attrib.c in NetHack 3.6.0, line 18](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.0_Release/attrib.c#L18)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/explode.c in NetHack 3.6.2, line 436](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.2_Release/src/explode.c#L436)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.2, line 3609](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.2_Release/src/zap.c#L3609)

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.](/images/d/d3/Nh361-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Fire resistance/ko

From NetHackWiki
< Fire resistance
Jump to navigation Jump to search

화염 저항은 대부분의 화염 피해와 뜨거운 물체로부터의 보호를 제공한다. 하지만 물약이 끓는 것이나 두루마리, 마법서가 타는 것을 막을 수는 없으며, 방화 처리가 되지 않은 갑옷이 불타는 것도 막을 수 없다. 게헨놈 입장 전까지는 필수적으로 갖춰야 할 저항인데, 넘쳐나는 화염 함정들로부터의 최대 체력 감소를 막기 위해서이다.

The most popular way to become fire resistant is to eat corpses. Especially foodless players will be interested in other ways, or at least in avoiding traps.

Monks get intrinsic fire resistance at XL 11, and priests at XL 20.[1] Crowning also brings fire resistance with it.

Extrinsic fire resistance is granted by

  • Wearing a ring of fire resistance,
  • Wearing red dragon scale mail or scales,
  • Wielding Fire Brand,
  • Carrying the Mitre of Holiness, the priest quest artifact.

Monsters that are resistant to fire but not to cold are considered vulnerable to cold and take double damage from frosty explosions[2] and about 57% more damage from rays of cold.[3] This never applies to your character, even while polymorphed.

Sources

Intrinsic fire resistance can be obtained from eating the following corpses and globs:

Monster Conduct Difficulty Chance Notes
빨강 곰팡이 vegan 2 3%
회색 푸딩 vegetarian 4 7% acidic
젤라티너스 큐브 vegan 6 10% acidic
red naga hatchling meaty 4 10%
살점 골렘 meaty 10 12%
크로마틱 드래곤 meaty 23 17% poisonous, Caveman quest nemesis
불개미 meaty 6 20% abundant on the Valkyrie quest
파이로리스크 meaty 8 20%
빨강 나가 meaty 8 20%
옌도르의 마법사 meaty 34 25% 인간에게 식인
화염 거인 meaty 11 30% abundant on the Valkyrie quest
hell hound pup meaty 9 47%
Lord Surtur meaty 19 50% Valkyrie quest nemesis
salamander meaty 12 53% poisonous
hell hound meaty 14 80%
빨강 용 meaty 20 100%
Ixoth meaty 22 100% Knight quest nemesis

Messages

The following messages are associated with fire resistance:

"You feel a momentary chill."
You gained intrinsic fire resistance by eating a corpse or tin.
"You be chillin'."
You gained intrinsic fire resistance by eating a corpse or tin, while hallucinating.
"You feel cool!"
You gained intrinsic fire resistance by gaining a level.
"You feel warmer!"
You lost intrinsic fire resistance (level drain, gremlin attack).
"You feel mildly warm."
You were burnt, but suffered no damage due to fire resistance.

References

  1. ↑ attrib.c in NetHack 3.6.0, line 18
  2. ↑ src/explode.c in NetHack 3.6.2, line 436
  3. ↑ src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.2, line 3609

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.1. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

rawPage:
'''[[Fire|화염]] 저항'''은 대부분의 화염 피해와 뜨거운 물체로부터의 보호를 제공한다. 하지만 [[potion|물약]]이 끓는 것이나 [[scroll|두루마리]], [[spellbook|마법서]]가 타는 것을 막을 수는 없으며, [[fireproof|방화]] 처리가 되지 않은 갑옷이 [[erosion|불타는]] 것도 막을 수 없다. [[Gehennom|게헨놈]] 입장 전까지는 필수적으로 갖춰야 할 저항인데, 넘쳐나는 [[fire trap|화염 함정]]들로부터의 최대 체력 감소를 막기 위해서이다.

The most popular way to become fire resistant is to [[eat]] [[corpse]]s. Especially [[foodless]] players will be interested in  [[Foodless#Gaining_Intrinsics|other ways]], or at least in avoiding [[trap]]s.

[[Monk]]s get intrinsic fire resistance at XL 11, and [[priest]]s at XL 20.{{refsrc|attrib.c|18|nethack=3.6.0}} [[Crowning]] also brings fire resistance with it.

Extrinsic fire resistance is granted by
* Wearing a [[ring of fire resistance]],
* Wearing [[red dragon scale mail]] or scales,
* Wielding [[Fire Brand]],
* Carrying [[the Mitre of Holiness]], the [[priest]] [[quest artifact]].

Monsters that are resistant to fire but not to [[cold resistance|cold]] are considered ''vulnerable to cold'' and take double damage from frosty [[explosion]]s{{refsrc|src/explode.c|436|nethack=3.6.2}} and about 57% more damage from [[ray]]s of cold.{{refsrc|src/zap.c|3609|nethack=3.6.2}}  This never applies to your character, even while polymorphed.

==Sources==

Intrinsic fire resistance can be obtained from eating the following corpses and globs:
